fires.name: Diamond Creek Fire
fires.impact: Destroyed several homes and other structures, significant economic losses to the agricultural industry, displaced residents, significant impact on air quality.

fires.name: Jolly Mountain Fire
fires.impact: Caused evacuations and road closures in the area.

fires.name: Uno Peak Fire
fires.impact: Threatened homes and structures in the area.

fires.name: Diamond Butte Fire
fires.impact: Caused evacuations and road closures in the area.

fires.name: The Ryegrass Coulee Fire
fires.impact: The fire burned dry conditions of grass, sagebrush, and timberland. It led to the closure of I-90 for a couple of weeks causing signficant travel disruptions.

fires.name: Milepost 90 Fire
fires.impact: Resulted in the closure of interstate 90. Smoke created hazardous air quality conidtions along the Columbia River and the gorge.  Evacuation orders were issued to nearby residents and the affected section of Interstate 90 was closed.

fires.name: The Cougar Creek Fire
fires.impact: The fire burned 42,712 acres of timberland in Chelan County, Washington. Evacuation orders were issued for several areas, and several homes were destroyed. The fire was fully contained on October 10, 2018.

fires.name: The Vulcan Mountain Fire
fires.impact: Evacuation orders were issued for several areas, and one outbuilding was destroyed. The fire was fully contained on August 29, 2018.

fires.name: 243 Command Fire
fires.impact: Mandatory evacuations near Beverly, making Spokaneâ€™s air quality the worst in the United States.

fires.name: Apple Acres Fire
fires.impact: Evacuation orders were issued, caused unhealthy air quality conditions.

fires.name: Pearl Hill Fire
fires.impact: Destroyed multiple structures, caused evacuations and road closures.

fires.name: Cold Springs Fire
fires.impact: Evacuations and road closures were ordered, caused significant property damage.

fires.name: Cub Creek 2 Fire
fires.impact: Threatened homes, caused evacuations and road closures.

fires.name: Cedar Creek Fire
fires.impact: Caused evacuations and road closures, impacted air quality in the region.

fires.name: Red Apple Fire
fires.impact: Threatened homes and orchards, caused evacuations and road closures.

fires.name: Stayman Flats Fire
fires.impact: Led to a Level 3 evacuation order for some residents.

fires.name: Keremeos Creek Wildfire
fires.impact: Caused smoke to spread across the state.

fires.name: White River Fire
fires.impact: Significant amount of smoke affecting Leavenworth, Cashmere, and Wenatchee. Chelan County issued a Level 3 evacuation order.

fires.name: Cow Canyon Fire
fires.impact: Grew quickly due to dry conditions.
